ufsagqiþs warþ dauþus in sigis.
1COR 15.55 ƕar ist gazds þeins, dauþu?
ƕar ist sigis þein, halja?
1COR 15.56 aþþan gazds dauþaus frawaurhts, iþ mahts frawaurhtais witoþ.
1COR 15.57 iþ guda awiliuþ ize gaf unsis sigis þairh fraujan unsarana Iesu Xristau.
1COR 15.58 swaei nu, broþrjus meinai liubans, tulgjai wairþiþ, ungawagidai, ufarfulljandans in waurstwa fraujins sinteino, witandans þatei arbaiþs izwara nist lausa in fraujin.
1COR 16.1 Iþ bi gabaur þata þaim weiham, swaswe garaidida aikklesjom Galate, swa jah jus taujiþ.
1COR 16.2 ainƕarjanoh sabbate ƕarjizuh izwara fram sis silbin lagjai huhjands þatei wili, ei ni, biþe qimau, þan gabaur wairþai.
1COR 16.3 aþþan biþe qima, þanzei gakiusiþ þairh bokos þans sandja briggan anst izwara in Iairusalem.
1COR 16.4 jah þan jabai ist mis wairþ galeiþan, galeiþand miþ mis.
1COR 16.5 aþþan qima at izwis þan Makidonja usleiþa;
Makidonja auk þairhgagga.
1COR 16.6 iþ at izwis waitei salja aiþþau jah wintru wisa, ei jus mik gasandjaiþ þisƕaduh þei ik wrato.
1COR 16.7 ni wiljau auk izwis nu þairhleiþands saiƕan;
unte wenja mik ƕo ƕeilo saljan at izwis, jabai frauja fraletiþ.
1COR 16.8 wis-uþ-þan in Aifaison und paintekusten.
1COR 16.9 haurds auk mis usluknoda mikila jah waurstweiga, jah andastaþjos managai.
1COR 16.10 aþþan jabai qimai Teimauþaius, saiƕiþ ei unagands sijai at izwis, unte waurstw fraujins waurkeiþ, swaswe jah ik.
1COR 16.11 ni ƕashun imma frakunni...
1COR 16.12 aþþan bi Apaullon þana broþar bandwja izwis þatei filu ina bad ei is qemi at izwis miþ broþrum, jah aufto ni was wilja ei nu qemi;
iþ qimiþ, biþe uhtiug.
1COR 16.13 wakaiþ standaiduh in galaubeinai,
wairaleiko taujaiþ,
gaþwastidai sijaiþ.
1COR 16.14 allata izwar in friaþwai wairþai.

1COR 16.15 bidja izwis, broþrjus, wituþ gard Staifanaus, þatei sind anastodeins Akaïje jah du andbahtja þaim weiham gasatidedun sik, 1COR 16.16 ei nu jah jus ufhausjaiþ þaim swaleikaim jah allaim þaim gawaurstwam jah arbaidjandam.
1COR 16.17 aþþan fagino in qumis Staifanaus jah Faurtunataus jah Akaïkaus, unte izwarana waninassu þai usfullidedun.
1COR 16.18 gaþrafstidedun auk jah meinana ahman jah izwarana;
ufkunnaiþ nu þans swaleikans.
1COR 16.19 goljand izwis aikklesjons Asiais.
goleiþ izwis in fraujin filu Akwla jah Priska miþ ingardjon seinai aikklesjon, at þaimei jah salja.
1COR 16.20 goljand izwis broþrjus allai.
goleiþ izwis misso in frijonai weihai.
1COR 16.21 goleins meinai handau Pawlus.
1COR 16.22 jabai ƕas ni frijoþ fraujan Iesu Xristu, sijai anaþaima:
maran aþa.
1COR 16.23 ansts fraujins Iesuis miþ izwis.
1COR 16.24 frijaþwa meina miþ allaim izwis in Xristau Iesu.
amen.
1COR Explicit.0 Du Kaurinþium ·a· ustauh.
Du Kaurinþium frume melida ist us Filippai, swe qeþun sumai;
iþ mais þugkeiþ bi silbins apaustaulaus insahtai melida wisan us Asiai.
2COR Incipit.0 Du Kaurinþaium anþara dustodeiþ.
2COR 1.1 Pawlus apaustaulus Iesuis Xristaus þairh wiljan gudis jah Teimauþaius broþar aikklesjon gudis þizai wisandein in Kaurinþon miþ allaim þaim weiham þaim wisandam in allai Akaïjai:
2COR 1.2 ansts izwis jah gawairþi fram guda attin unsaramma jah fraujin Iesu Xristau.

2COR 1.3 þiuþiþs guþ jah atta fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus, atta bleiþeino jah guþ allaizo gaþlaihte, 2COR 1.4 saei gaþrafstida uns ana allai aglon unsarai, ei mageima weis gaþrafstjan þans in allaim aglom þairh þo gaþlaiht þizaiei gaþrafstidai sijum silbans fram guda.
2COR 1.5 unte swaswe ufarassus ist þulaine Xristaus in uns, swa jah þairh Xristu ufar filu ist jah gaþrafsteins unsara.
